en-gb: A neighbor complains about noise from nearby house
A neighbor's dog is barking
As a result of the fight a woman is screaming out of her lungs to her husband regarding a difference they had related to their child.
A citizen reports that a kid is heard crying produsely from the back side of the house looking through the slightly open door
As soon as the parents realise the absense of the kid they decide to file a report through the INSPEC2T app.
The woman rushes out of the house gets in the car and starts looking for the kid; she is in panic mode and drives recklessly. As a result she hits an electricity pillar
The police surrounds the area to avoid any chances of electrocution or the generation of fire
returned to the nearby police station
The officer visited the reported location and resolved the issue. A couple was arguing in the precense of a 9 yr old kid. None of the parents wanted to file the incident.

The officer visited the reported location and resolved the issue. A couple was arguing in the precense of a 9 yr old kid. However the officer needed to transfer the child to the social services and ensure that everything is ok
Officers find the kid and they immediately contact hs parents
The situation escalated with no reason. The woman was saved by miracle and the boy was found by citizens
The situation escalated with no reason. The woman was saved by miracle and the boy was found by officers
A citizen reported littering in around his neighbourhood. His newly moved neighbors do not seem to respect others' space
The citizen's trust in police is decreased
A citizen reported littering in around his neighbourhood for the second time
The two neighbours are involved in an argument
The argument escalated on a fight which required the intervention of the police.  The two neighbours seem to be unfriendly with each other with the issue between them still unresolved
A police officer resolves the issue and the two neighbours restored their trust in police and managed to build a strong relationship
A citizen reported that her dog got sick after their walk around the neighbourhood and claimed the existence of pet poison around the area

Multiple citizens reported the existense of pet poison through the use of the INSPEC2T app. Some of them also associated the event with a number of locations. Thanks to the spatiotemporal processing in INSPEC2T. The system suggested the correlation of some reports and provided an estimation of the location.
Thanks to system indications and the contribution of citizens the officer managed to find and remove the poison within the area
The officers spent a long time on this but it paid off. They have managed to identify the poison and cleared the area.
Broadcasted a message to the area and urged anyone knowing anything about the event to contact the police or file a report. The case is not closed until the perpetrator is found
Multiple citizens provided key information to the police about a person that seems to be responsible for putting the poison to the area
The suspect is being arrested and is sent for questioning
The public seems to be losing trust in the police. They feel that the system does not work and get discouraged in providing input in the future
Report from user George names a suspect and reports multiple harassment events and damages on his asstes
George who has previously filed a report called a suspect messing with his parck car. George comes in arguments outside his hhouse and a neighbour files an anonymous report
The two officers managed to trace down the suspect who declines allegations.
The two officers managed to trace down the suspect who declines allegations.
Ignoring the case resulted in the generation of even more aggressive hostile reaction on behalf of the two parties
The citizens provide valuable information to the police, such information has helped to resolve the issue
Affter a lot of effort the officers managed to calm down the situation and suggested the intervention of consulting for resolving their issues
Progress on the investigation revealed that George and the reported suspect have a long run of financial differences. The police suggests the invasion of lawyers for resolving the issue
A report from a user states race discrimination in employment. Their employer does not treat them equally
The reporter is in the process of forming an awareness campaign against their employer, clearly stating the ignorance of police,. Dedicate some forces to minimise the dissatisfaction
The officer approached the employer and the apporpriate public body and explained the policies behind equal rights. You are now presented with an option to find the employer
You ignored the case and the public lost their trust in you. They believe that these things should matter
Your officer tried to exploain the restrictions of police when it comes to their resources but it wasn't enough
Your actions weren't transparent to the public and the victim dim not come to closure
You have broadcasted messages through the INSPEC2T Platform and social media stating that such behaviours are not acceptable and should not be tolerated. The offender however has left unpunished
You have fined the employer and broadcasted messages through the INSPEC2T platform and the social media stating that such behaviours are not acceptable and should not be tolerated
A report has been received from a hotel manager stating that a suspicious substance has been found in a room
A report has been received from a hotel manager stating that a suspicious substance has been found in a room
Your officers have visited the hotel, carefully collected the substance which was sent to the appropriate lab which confirmed the existence of large amounts of drugs. The room tenant has gone missing
You have requested citizens contribution. Through which you managed to get valuable information. allowing you to trace down the suspec's location

The room tenant returns to the room after the police has departed from the area. The hotel manager was assaulted while damages were caused in the reception area. The manager ended up in the nearest hospital with a serious concussion

The officer managed to trace down the suspect after organised efforts he was apprehended and was sent to questioning. The hotel manager is satisfied and the citizens' trust in the police has increased due to transparency
The officers manage to trace down the suspect and after organised efforts he was apprehended and was sent to questioning. The hotel manager is satisfied
A report has been received from a third country national anonymous user indicating that they are mistreated by their employer being forced to work too many hours every week
You have chosen not to take active action at this time but took the time to raise some awareness of the matter
An officer investigates the situation and finds out that the employer hires the victim's services to their relatives
Working together with public services resulted in finding a new home for the victim and filing charges to the offender. The extra time you have taken did not cause any significant consequences
You decided to ignore the case. The victim could not find an escape and ran away from their home. A person has now gone missing and the initial issue is still pending
Working together with public services resulted in finding a new home for the victim and filing charges to the offender.
Intelligence coming from citizens reports that the reporting victim was found on the streets in apretty bad shape. The public opinion in negative and does not support your actions
Your officers did not manage to solve the issues. The issues are still pending. You can either dedicate more forces and solve the matters or ask for citizen intelligence
The public returns valuable information that results in tracing down the missing person. It is now time to deal with the offender
Your officers managed to apprehend the offending employer and are in search of the missing person
You decided to ignore the case. Th public opinion is negative and does not support your actions
Your officers managed to apprehend the offending employer. Well done, you have managed to dela with the situation in resonable time
A report has been received from a registered citizen indicating that a car on Griva Digeni Ave. has just caught on fire. The fire department has already been called and dispatched resources
You selected to ignore the case. You are putting citizens in danger
Messages have been broadcasted to the citizens with information about the event. Take some security measures or wait to close the case
Two officers were sent to ensure public safety during the process. The police officers capture images from the site. Dedicate some resources to ensure the area is secure for use by the public
The case is now closed. You have left the area unsecured through and citizens are in danger
Messages have been broadcasted to the citizens with diverting instructions and pictoral content for avoiding any accidents. You have left the area unsecured though
The area is now open for use by the public. You are now faced with the choice to inform the publice about the event or close the case
The case is successfully closed. You have taken the right precautions. Well Done
Messages have been broadcasted to the citizens for their information. You are gaining their trust
A suspicious person is seen inside a green van outside a pharmacy in the middle of the night. The filed report contains the van's number plate
A robbery has been reported. The alarm of the pharmacy was activated. The pharmacist who was resting at the back of the room is wounded. A quantity of drugs have gone missing
Gathered citizen intelligence! Citizens confirm that there is indeed an unknown and suspicious person in the area. They even mention that this person was previously seen with 2 other parties

The officer went to the area. The suspicious person pretended to be busy on their phone. The officer approached the suspect who claimed that he parker there to speak on the phone and he immediately drove away
x
Citizens point the direction of suspects. Along with vehicle number plates. The number plates match the initial report
The officers investigate the area and gather evidence. The investigation of the crime is forwarded to the appropriate department
You check the van's number plate and find out that they do not belong to that vehicle.
x
The suspect was apprehended and was sent for questioning. Well done
x
The suspect was arrested and it was proved that he was involved in a planned robbery. Good Job!
A report mentions that a car is left on the side of a field a few days now. parked in a messy way. They also provide the number plates.
You decided to do nothing on the matter. No major backlash is caused but you certainly did not satisfy the reporter and victim's immediate community

The number plates point to the owner who was contacted and mentioned that his daughter, who is studying in a nearby city, drives the car. The concerned parent mentions that his daughter suffers from memory problems
You decided to ask more information from citizens on the abandoned car. Citizens managed to provide you with some useful information

An officer visited the abandoned car and gathered some evidence They also managed to trace down the girl. Who mentioned that a few days ago she went to a party and on the way back she lost her orientation and forgot where she left her car
Great Job! You managed to solve the problem
Thank the citizen for their participation in bringing the matter to the plice's attention
